content:
As of 2021, some EV heavy-duty buses available for sale in the United States include:

* Proterra Catalyst E2
* Proterra Catalyst XR
* New Flyer Xcelsior CHARGE
* Gillig Low Floor
* Thomas Built Buses Saf-T-Liner C2 Jouley
* New Flyer MiDi
* Alexander Dennis Enviro500
* Neoplan eCitaro
* Prevost X3-45 Electric
* Blue Bird Electric Bus
Please note that this list might not be comprehensive and could be subject to change with time.
